title: WPP chief Sorrell investigated over misconduct allegation
text:
WPP chief Sorrell investigated over misconduct allegation 12:32pm BST - 00:37 
The world's biggest advertising firm, WPP, is investigating Chief Executive Martin Sorrell over an allegation of personal misconduct. He denies any wrongdoing. David Doyle reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The world's biggest advertising firm, WPP, is investigating Chief Executive Martin Sorrell over an allegation of personal misconduct. He denies any wrongdoing. David Doyle reports.
